languages.text: "Сей мир принадлежит династии Винтерскейл. Но я не верю... нет, я не верю, что Его Светлость Каллигос мог бы сотрудничать с ксеносами. Темно-красный и буро-зеленый окутывали его стан каждый раз, когда речь заходила об охоте на врагов Человечества. Он их... презирал. Ненавидел".

"This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."
languages.original_text: "Сей мир принадлежит династии Винтерскейл. Но я не верю... нет, я не верю, что Его Светлость Каллигос мог бы сотрудничать с ксеносами. Темно-красный и буро-зеленый окутывали его стан каждый раз, когда речь заходила об охоте на врагов Человечества. Он их... презирал. Ненавидел".

traits.locale_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe— I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

"This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

"This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

languages.text: “这里是温特斯凯尔家族的世界，但我不相信……我拒绝接受卡里戈斯大人与异形合谋的可能性。每当提起追捕人类之敌的相关话题，他的身上就会被暗红色和棕绿色所包围。他……鄙视异形，痛恨他们。”
languages.original_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

traits.locale_text: “这里是温特斯凯尔家族的世界，但我不相信……我拒绝接受卡里戈斯大人与异形合谋的可能性。每当提起追捕人类之敌的相关话题，他的身上就会被暗红色和棕绿色所包围。他……鄙视异形，痛恨他们。”

languages.text: "Diese Welt gehört Haus Winterzunder. Aber ich glaube nicht ... Ich weigere mich zu glauben, dass seine Lordschaft Calligos jemals mit Xenos zusammenarbeiten würde. Er wurde jedes Mal in Dunkelrot und Braungrün getaucht, wenn über die Jagd auf die Feinde der Menschheit gesprochen wurde. Er ... hat sie verabscheut. Hat sie gehasst."
languages.original_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Welt gehört Haus Winterzunder. Aber ich glaube nicht ... Ich weigere mich zu glauben, dass seine Lordschaft Calligos jemals mit Xenos zusammenarbeiten würde. Er wurde jedes Mal in Dunkelrot und Braungrün getaucht, wenn über die Jagd auf die Feinde der Menschheit gesprochen wurde. Er ... hat sie verabscheut. Hat sie gehasst."

languages.text: «Este mundo pertenece a la casa Winterscale. Pero no creo... me niego a creer que lord Calligos se rebajase a colaborar con xenos. Su aura se teñía de rojo oscuro y verde pardo cada vez que se mencionaba el tema de cazar a los enemigos de la Humanidad. Él... los despreciaba. Los odiaba».
languages.original_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

traits.locale_text: «Este mundo pertenece a la casa Winterscale. Pero no creo... me niego a creer que lord Calligos se rebajase a colaborar con xenos. Su aura se teñía de rojo oscuro y verde pardo cada vez que se mencionaba el tema de cazar a los enemigos de la Humanidad. Él... los despreciaba. Los odiaba».

languages.text: « Ce monde appartient à la maison Winterscale, mais je ne pense pas... Non, je refuse de croire que le seigneur Calligos se serait abaissé à collaborer avec des xénos. Un voile rouge sombre et verdâtre l'enveloppait chaque fois qu'il était question de chasser les ennemis de l'humanité. Il... les méprisait. Il les haïssait, même. »
languages.original_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

traits.locale_text: « Ce monde appartient à la maison Winterscale, mais je ne pense pas... Non, je refuse de croire que le seigneur Calligos se serait abaissé à collaborer avec des xénos. Un voile rouge sombre et verdâtre l'enveloppait chaque fois qu'il était question de chasser les ennemis de l'humanité. Il... les méprisait. Il les haïssait, même. »

languages.text: 「この惑星はウィンタースケール家のものです。カリゴス閣下がゼノと協力するなんて信じられません…信じたくありません。人類の敵を狩るという話になるたびに、彼の姿は暗赤色と茶色がかった緑色に包まれました。彼は…ゼノを軽蔑していました。憎んでいたのです」
languages.original_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星はウィンタースケール家のものです。カリゴス閣下がゼノと協力するなんて信じられません…信じたくありません。人類の敵を狩るという話になるたびに、彼の姿は暗赤色と茶色がかった緑色に包まれました。彼は…ゼノを軽蔑していました。憎んでいたのです」

languages.text: "Bu dünya Winterscale Hanesi'ne ait. Ancak inanmıyorum... Lord Calligos Hazretleri'nin zenolarla iş birliği yaptığına inanmayı reddediyorum. Ne zaman İnsanlık düşmanlarını avlama konusu açılsa koyu kırmızı, kahverengi-yeşil tonlara bürünür. Onlardan... İğrenir. Nefret eder."
languages.original_text: "This world belongs to House Winterscale. But I don't believe... I refuse to believe His Lordship Calligos would ever collaborate with xenos. Dark red and brownish-green would envelop his figure every time the subject of hunting the enemies of Humanity was brought up. He... despised them. Hated them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünya Winterscale Hanesi'ne ait. Ancak inanmıyorum... Lord Calligos Hazretleri'nin zenolarla iş birliği yaptığına inanmayı reddediyorum. Ne zaman İnsanlık düşmanlarını avlama konusu açılsa koyu kırmızı, kahverengi-yeşil tonlara bürünür. Onlardan... İğrenir. Nefret eder."
